name: ASCII Achievement Mania: Space Shooter
description:
Enjoy the long forgotten minimalistic retro game concept with relaxing music.
It is a retro arcade game featuring simple two-dimensional ASCII graphics and was inspired by original games of 80's.


Being under attack of space intruders and the alien shooters, your goal is to save the galaxy from its alien enemies!Features:
  • classic game concept
  • retro ASCII graphic style
  • ambient music
  • 5000 Steam achievements
